creator: robertlaferla@attbi.com
text:
There is an outdated URL in **TWO** places in the httpd.conf file.  Please 
update:


# See ftp://ftp.isi.edu/in-notes/iana/assignments/character-sets

should be:

# See http://www.iana.org/assignments/character-sets

This is fixed now and will show up in the next release (2.0.45).
Thanks for reporting the issue.
creator: erik@codefaktor.de
